<mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="540" y="280" /> <mxPoint x="180" y="280" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-0" value="<div>Atacante pode tirar proveito de entrada de dados e o envio automático de um e-mail para o utilizador que fez o pedido </div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f5f5f5;fontColor=#333333;strokeColor=#666666;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="440" y="120" width="200" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-13" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-1" target="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-12" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="420" y="430" /> <mxPoint x="420" y="430" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-1" value="<font data-darkreader-inline-color="" style="--darkreader-inline-color: #e8e6e3;" color="#000000">Injetar código SQL no campo do e-mail para recuperação de palavra-passe, aproveitando-se de falhas de validação ou sanitização</font>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;rounded=0;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="320" width="200" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-15" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-3" target="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-14" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="660" y="430" /> <mxPoint x="660" y="430" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-3" value="<font data-darkreader-inline-color="" style="--darkreader-inline-color: #e8e6e3;" color="#000000">Inserir scripts maliciosos, comprometendo a segurança do sistema ou roubando informações confidenciais dos utilizadores</font>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;rounded=0;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="560" y="320" width="200" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-11" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-6" target="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-10" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="180" y="480" /> <mxPoint x="180" y="480" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-6" value="<font data-darkreader-inline-color="" style="--darkreader-inline-color: #e8e6e3;" color="#000000">Sobrecarregar o sistema com uma grande quantidade de pedidos maliciosos de recuperação de palavra-passe, tornando-o lento ou indisponível</font>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;rounded=0;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="320" width="200" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-10" value="<font data-darkreader-inline-color="" style="--darkreader-inline-color: #e8e6e3;" color="#000000">Implementar mecanismos de controlo de tráfego para limitar o número de pedidos que um único utilizador pode fazer num determinado período de tempo</font>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;rounded=0;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="480" width="200" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-12" value="<font data-darkreader-inline-color="" style="--darkreader-inline-color: #e8e6e3;" color="#000000">Implementar validação&nbsp;dos dados de entrada</font> no cliente e no servidor" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;rounded=0;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="480" width="200" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="XgY4lxPiN6GVmBq9-WwZ-14" value="<font color="#000000">Aplicar filtragem de entrada para remover caracteres especiais e evitar a execução de scripts maliciosos</font>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;rounded=0;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="560" y="480" width="200" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="0cN3NvyYYKUxZYTGoqJg-0" value="<font data-darkreader-inline-color="" style="--darkreader-inline-color: #e8e6e3;" color="#000000">Intercetar o pedido de recuperação de palavra~passe de forma a imitar o e-mail gerado e fazer um ataque de phishing<br></font>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="800" y="320" width="200" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="0cN3NvyYYKUxZYTGoqJg-1" value="<font data-darkreader-inline-color="" style="--darkreader-inline-color: #e8e6e3;" color="#000000">Utilizar protocolo SSL de forma a autenticar o utilizador com o servidor e encriptar os dados constituintes do pedido<br></font>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="800" y="480" width="200" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="0cN3NvyYYKUxZYTGoqJg-2" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="440" y="360" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="540" y="280" /> <mxPoint x="900" y="280" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="0cN3NvyYYKUxZYTGoqJg-3" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="0cN3NvyYYKUxZYTGoqJg-0" target="0cN3NvyYYKUxZYTGoqJg-1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="390" y="410" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="440" y="360" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
